meanings.definition: A prickly shrub with yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The furze bush in the garden has bright yellow flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful furze shrub blooming in the field.
meanings.sent3: The little bird perched on the furze bush and sang a sweet melody.
meanings.sent4: The golden furze flowers danced in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The prickly furze plant added a splash of color to the landscape.

meanings.definition: To cover or clothe with furze.
meanings.sent1: She decided to furze the fence to give it a natural look.
meanings.sent2: The workers will furze the pathway with the thorny bushes.
meanings.sent3: He tried to furze his bicycle with furze branches for a unique style.
meanings.sent4: The artist furzed the sculpture with tiny furze flowers for a special touch.
meanings.sent5: The gardener furzed the garden bed with furze to create a barrier.
